lectures.Title: What is Rust?
lectures.Comment: Today's topic is a quick introduction to Rust and how to set up a project.

lectures.Title: Rust Basics I
lectures.Comment: Today we start writing some code in Rust!

lectures.Title: Rust Basics II
lectures.Comment: We cover some additional compound data types and have a short code demo.

lectures.Title: Strings and Matching
lectures.Comment: This is the first in a 2 part lecture covering Strings, Enums and the match statement.

lectures.Title: Enums, Matching
lectures.Comment: This lecture covers Enums and further explain the match statement.

lectures.Title: Introduction to Ownership
lectures.Comment: This lecture introduces one of the most important concepts in Rust -- the Ownership model. This can be a confusing concept, and we'll look into it over a few lectures. For this lecture, I recommend also taking a look at Chapter 4.1 in the Rust Book for a wordier explanation of some of the concepts

lectures.Title: Ownership and Borrowing
lectures.Comment: For this lecture we take a deeper look into Ownership and explore the concept of Borrowing.

lectures.Title: Borrowing, Slices
lectures.Comment: For this lecture we take another look at Borrowing and take a deep dive into the concept of Slices in Rust.

lectures.Title: Structs Part 1
lectures.Comment: For this lecture, we will look at the basics of some structs!

lectures.Title: Structs Part 2
lectures.Comment: Lecture 9 has dropped! In this lecture, we finish up structs.

lectures.Title: Generics and Smart Pointers
lectures.Comment: For this lecture we take our first look at Generics and Smart Pointers.

lectures.Title: Generics and Smart Pointers
lectures.Comment: Today's lecture is Traits. We will expand upon the idea of Generics and explore how Rust handles the idea of "interface".

lectures.Title: Intro to Threads
lectures.Comment: This lectures introduces one of the coolest parts of Rust -- Writing multithreaded programs!

lectures.Title: Thread Ownership, Messaging
lectures.Comment: Today we explore how ownership in Rust interacts with multithreading, and also take the first look at how threads interact with each other.

lectures.Title: Thread Messaging
lectures.Comment: Today we take a deeper look at how threads message each other.
